# `sys users` for [system](/commands/categories/system.md)

<div class='command-title'>View information about the users on the system.</div>

## Signature

```> sys users {flags} ```


## Input/output types:

| input   | output |
| ------- | ------ |
| nothing | table  |

## Examples

Show info about the system users
```nu
> sys users

```
